name: Sunken
description:
Ahoy Matey's!Take t' th' high seas wit' yer wits about ye,
Fight endless hoards o' scallywags all on one screen,
sharpen yer teeth on th' blades o' yer fallen foes.
Sunken be action an packed retro pirate game fer th' cot pvp crowd!
Y'arrrr!Shiver me timbers
  • Fast Paced Explosive Gameplay.
  • One Hit Kills.
  • Canon Balls Can Be Caught In Mid Air.
  • Up to 12 Players Local Multiplayer.
  • Endless hours of high seas, high stakes, pirate battle fun.
Shoot at other piratesDash t' block cannonballsPickup floatin' cannonballsFind ye booty!
